meanings.definition: The buying of goods and services by telephone or online.
meanings.sent1: My grandma enjoys teleshopping for clothes on her computer.
meanings.sent2: Teleshopping has become popular due to its convenience and variety.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally bought a giant teddy bear while teleshopping online.
meanings.sent4: Teleshopping opens up a world of products right at your fingertips.
meanings.sent5: Teleshopping allows you to shop from the comfort of your own home.

meanings.definition: The act of shopping through a television program.
meanings.sent1: Last night, I watched an interesting teleshopping show for kitchen gadgets.
meanings.sent2: Teleshopping channels often showcase unique products at great prices.
meanings.sent3: The teleshopping host made me laugh with his enthusiastic demonstrations.
meanings.sent4: Teleshopping on TV can sometimes feel like a virtual shopping spree.
meanings.sent5: The teleshopping program featured a special discount for viewers who called in.
